abstract: A gaffe by JPMorgan Chase resulted in the peformance figures of two Pershing Square Capital Management hedge funds being revealed, Dow Jones reported.
snippet: A gaffe by JPMorgan Chase resulted in the peformance figures of two Pershing Square Capital Management hedge funds being revealed, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: It seems that pesky “send” button got in the way of Pershing Square Capital Management‘s efforts to keep its performance numbers private.

headline.main: By Accident, Pershing Square Numbers Get Out

abstract: At least twice over the past year or so — and especially this week — Citigroup’s best-laid plans have been derailed by Wells Fargo, its scrappier West Coast rival.
snippet: At least twice over the past year or so — and especially this week — Citigroup’s best-laid plans have been derailed by Wells Fargo, its scrappier West Coast rival.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has traditionally seen Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase as its main rivals, competing fiercely with the other two giant universal banks across a broad spectrum of businesses.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
